name: NP Team
author: Golam Ahmed Pasha

sections.description:
NP Team is an awesome plugin for your WordPress website. This plugin will enable you to add team member option in your wordpress site with effects and plenty of options. You can change color & other setting from it’s options panel.

It has a lot of options in option panel of this plugin. You can change Title color, Position Text Color, Description Color, Background color, Background Hover Color and Shadow Color from options panel of this plugin. Below you can see the list of the options name of the options panel of this plugin.

*Title color *Position Text Color *Description Color *Background color
*Background Hover Color *Shadow Color

How to use this plugin
1. At first, you have to add members how much you want. 1. Then create a page and add team shortcode to the editor by clicking on NP-Team icon.

To see demo & documentation click here.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
